premise_source_doc_sentence: Michael Benjamin Bay  (  born February 17 , 1965  )  is an American filmmaker known for directing and producing big-budget action films characterized by fast cutting , stylistic visuals and extensive use of special effects , including frequent depictions of explosions .

premise_source_doc_sentence: After several second unit director 's assignments in special effects-heavy films like Men in Black and Michael Bay 's Pearl Harbor , Brevig 's previous 3D experience and expertise turned out to be the factor that helped him get his first full-blown director 's job when he was offered the chance to direct the 2008 film Journey to the Center of the Earth 3-D  (  a New Line Cinema release  )  , the first narrative feature shot entirely in digital 3-D .
